page.title: 13LOCAL PEOPLE OF WITLEY
page.content: {Mr. Walters}owns Witley Wines,the local 'Off Licence'shop.The shop sells groceries as well as wines and spirits. The shop has been open 18 months. Four people work in the shop and they have lots of customers.The shop opens at 9.00am till 9.30pm. The shop is in the middle of Witley,on the main Petworth Road. {T.E.Francis}is a newsagents at the end of Roke Lane They sell different newspapers,sweets,stationery and magazines.It is very popular with the local schoolchildren,who buy their sweets and comics there. {The Sally Lunn Coffee Shop }has been open for about 6 months.It sells lunches,snacks,cakes,cream teas and coffee.It is owned by Mr and Mrs Eliis.It is situated on the Petworth Road,opposite the 'Star' public house.
